summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2010, for the improvement of West 56th Street from 1st Avenue Northwest to 2nd Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20415 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
